page.title: 01ALDERLEY EDGE AREA
page.content: {The area has great natural beauty and {historic character. Since Victorian days the{population {has grown rapidly.}Living standards are high and there is an active community life. In a{predominantly middle class}area the houses are generally large and are served by an excellent transport system.Shopping facilities include {high class}stores such as Finnigan's, Sainsbury's and Safeways and these are supported by a wide range of private shops.Most workers are employed outside the area. Local festivals are held each year.Clubs and societies are in abundance and cater for all ages and interests.About a quarter of the land is{farmland or parkland,}thus,despite modern development,the area still retains its rural character.
